description: Loop along Veddar River Mountain. Start off Old Yale Service Road. Gives you few views over Abbotsford and Chilliwack. Also nice little falls.
directions: Get on number 1 hwy and go until you get to No3 Rd Abbotsford get off and head southeast and follow until you get to 3 way stop at yarrow central. Take a left and follow yarrow central until you get to wilson rd and head south down wilson rd, when you get to  Majuba Hill Rd take another left and followup till you see the trail. You can park outside the trail. Follow the old Yale service road trail till you see a trail on the right. Follow that up the mountain and it will take you to the start of the Duck Farm Loop. Enjoy ! Good work out!
title: Duck Farm Loop
